member.name: T:Symbol.StandardForms.EnabledDecoders
member.summary: The EnabledDecoders standard barcode form provides a dialog that allows each decoders parameters to be viewed and changed.
member.remarks: The EnabledDecoders dialog provides a CheckList as well as a SymList for configuring each of the decoders. It is normally created using the static Run method.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.EnabledDecoders.DoScale
member.summary: This function does the (initial) scaling of the form by re-setting the related parameters (if required) and then calling the Scale(...) internally.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.EnabledDecoders.Scale(Symbol.StandardForms.EnabledDecoders)
member.summary: This function scales the given Form and its child controls in order to make them completely viewable, based on the screen width and height.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.EnabledDecoders.Run(Symbol.Barcode.Reader)
member.summary: The Run method is the recommended method to use to create the EnabledDecoders dialog.
member.param: The Barcode Reader object to view and change decoder parameters.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.EnabledDecoders.#ctor(Symbol.Barcode.Reader)
member.summary: EnabledDecoders constructor creates a dialog that can be used to modify barcode reader decoder parameters.
member.param: A barcode reader object that contains the decoder parameters to be viewed or modified.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.EnabledDecoders.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: T:Symbol.StandardForms.ScanParamsForm
member.summary: The ScanParamsForm standard barcode form provides a dialog that allows each of the Reader's scan parameters to be viewed and changed.
member.remarks: The ScanParamsForm dialog provides a tab control with different feedback parameters that can be changed. This class is normally instantiated using the static Run method.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.ScanParamsForm.DoScale
member.summary: This function does the (initial) scaling of the form by re-setting the related parameters (if required) and then calling the Scale(...) internally.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.ScanParamsForm.Scale(Symbol.StandardForms.ScanParamsForm)
member.summary: This function scales the given Form and its child controls in order to make them completely viewable, based on the screen width and height.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.ScanParamsForm.Run(Symbol.Barcode.Reader)
member.summary: The static Run() method is used to create display the ScanParamsForm.
member.remarks: This is the recommended method for created a ScanParamsForm.
member.param: A Barcode.Reader object that contains the scan parameters to be viewed or changed.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.ScanParamsForm.#ctor(Symbol.Barcode.Reader)
member.summary: The ScanParamsForm constructor with settable barcode reader object.
member.param: A Barcode.Reader object that contains the scan parameters to be viewed or changed.

member.name: M:Symbol.StandardForms.ScanParamsForm.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.
